snippet.title: Unavowed teaser trailer!
snippet.description:
Find out more at http://www.unavowed-game.com.

Coming to Windows in 2018!

With dark forces hell-bent on destroying New York City, it’s always been up to the Unavowed to keep the evil in check. For centuries this supernatural squad has quietly protected humanity by driving hungry demons back into the shadows. But something has changed. Their age-old methods are no longer working. New blood is required to protect the mundane world from a threat stronger than any these crime-fighters have faced. Join the ranks of the Unavowed, and fight against the oncoming darkness.

Developed and published by: Wadjet Eye Games
Voiceover: SungWon Cho
Music by: Thomas Regin
Trailer created by: Derek Lieu
